General.Name: Forus S.A
General.Description: Forus S.A. designs, produces, imports, markets, and distributes footwear, apparel, and accessories in Chile, Peru, Colombia, and Uruguay. The company offers its products under the various brands, such as Hush Puppies, Columbia, CatFootwear, RKF, Merrell, Mountain Hardwear, WLS, Patagonia, Cushe, SEBAGO, Church's English, Norseg, Skullcandy, Nine West, Hush Puppies Kids, Calpany, FUNSPORT, Brooks, azaleia, We love Shoes, BILLABONG, 7Veinte, Pasqualini, D house, Shoe Express, Element, Jansport, Zapatos.cl, Rockford, Burton, Keds, and Body and Soul brands through stores and online. The company was formerly known as Comercial Hush Puppies Chile Limitada and changed its name to Forus S.A. in December 1991. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Santiago, Chile. Forus S.A. is a subsidiary of Inversiones Costanera Limitada.
